I ordered two different sizes of this shirt, in Black, Brown and Grey hoping to find the perfect fit. Unfortunately, I encountered several issues:  Inconsistent Fabric Quality: The fabric thickness varied significantly between the two sizes. One shirt had a lighter material, while the other was much thicker and felt more substantial. While I liked both, one I could only wear in the winter, while the other could work year-round. This inconsistency was disappointing and made it hard to gauge the overall quality of the product.  Poor Craftsmanship: After just a couple of wears, the thread along the bottom seam of one shirt began to unravel, which was frustrating and left the shirt looking sloppy.  Fit Issues: The shirt is not long and the Med was too short for my preference. The Large was better. It's definitely not ideal for those looking for a longer, more flattering silhouette.  While the style and collared V-neck design are nice in theory, the quality and fit issues make this a product I cannot highly recommend.

Beautiful green Wiholl blouse. Blouse is 90% polyester 10% spandex, the fabric feels like crushed velvet, very soft but yet has a nice weight. Will keep you warm. The blouse has a little stretch. So It will hug your body. The length is perfect. Can be tucked in with no issue. This product is true to size, follow the manufacturer's sizing guide. So if you like a tight fit order your size, for a looser fit order larger size. I recommend before washing, turn blouse inside out and place in a sweater bag. Overall it's a fun blouse to wear with jeans and boots. Enjoy

Shirt fit true to size. It was perfect. No weird factory smells. The color was exactly what you see in the picture. Awesome experience. Highly recommend.

For the longest time I was not a fan of collar or V-neck shirts but over time as my body shape has changed I wanted to give these another try and I love how these look on me. 评论概述: Quality material that stands on its own
评论详情: I was impressed upon opening this shirt up. You can immediately feel the fabric is thick enough to wear without a camisole and your money was well spent. It also has a nice stretch and you won’t have to worry about your bra shining through the material in photos. Material is soft and thick, but thick in a good way. This top stands alone. You don’t need to layer on top of it. This will be great for fall/winter occasions when you take your jacket off and just have this top underneath. It’s basically a collared sweater. I love it. I would size up if you’re between sizes. But is has great stretch if u want the body con look or to tuck into a skirt or pant pick your true size, maybe even even 1 size down. But that’s if you want the body suit effect. Which is nice because the fabric has great coverage. May need to iron/steam after being packed and shipped.
I paired this with a jacket & it is perfect! A beautiful business casual shirt 💟 it fits very well!!! Extremely SOFT. My storefront has a better picture of just the shirt

The quality is incredible. True to size. Breathable but cozy, very fitting works the body shape. Really recommend.

This shirt is perfect for all different situations. I can dress it down with jeans or wear it to work with slacks. The material is very comfortable and the color is cute!

I chose my size based on the chart in the IMAGES (not the drop-down menu.) The suggested size for me was L, though I usually take M in tops. I'm glad I did order the L based on their suggestion.  It fits very well - is fitted, but doesn't pull or bunch. The fabric is thicker than I expected, and very cozy/warm.  This would make a nice basic piece in a Dark Academia-type wardrobe.

First of all, this fabric used is AMAZING. The shirt is comfy because of this. It is soft yet it still looks perfect. This is wonderful for buisness casual wear.  The looks of this shirt are beautiful. There are so many potential outfits. I would definitely tell you to buy this!

评论概述: Excellent, warm shirt but runs small
评论详情: I typically wear a medium or large in tops.  I went with my instinct and order an XL.  I'm glad I did because the XL is very fitted.  I'm 5'11" and 157 pounds. The dark green is very pretty and the arms are long enough for me--I usually end up with my sleeves too short.  The material is not too thin, so I felt warm when I tried it on.  The quality is nice and the top wasn't wrinkled when it came out of the package.  I recommend sizing up a few sizes if you don't want a fitted look.  Also, the bust is quite snug for those ladies who need extra room up top.  It's a solid, versatile top and it can be worn casually or at the office on casual Fridays, etc.  You could also easily dress it up with some nice slacks.

This is good, but not great quality. It's actually very flattering, but also very fitted. So you might want to order up a size, and make sure you are comfortable with fitted shirts. If you have bulges you like to hide, this will display them instead.

评论概述: Very Soft - runs a bit small
评论详情: LOVE this shirt. The color is great and it's so soft!  There is some stretch to it but not a lot as it's thicker than I imagined.  I bought a small because I didn't think th sizing guide was correct but it is.  My other shirts are all small but this one is tight as the measurements were accurate.  I should have believed what they posted; however it's still a great shirt even if it is a little tight.

There are two size charts on this item (at least there were when I ordered it). They are both called Wiholl size chart. Go with the one in the photo(s) in the description and not with the one on the drop down below where you choose your size. I made the mistake of using the drop down chart and ordering a large (I usually wear a M or L) but if I had consulted the chart on the photos, I would have chosen an XL (not my normal size). There is a significant difference and the shirt I received (L) is just a bit too snug. I wish I had ordered the XL.  Other than that, the shirt is superb. It is extremely soft. It's stretchy, too. The collared v-neck looks very professional. It's comfortable and will look great with slacks or skirt. Or jeans. I will probably order in other colors, but I'll make sure to go up a size this time.

This is the ideal top; it comfortably sits between a regular shirt and a sweater because it is thick and warming, but not so thick that it's Fall/Winter only. The color is fantastic for welcoming the Autumn season and compliments all jewelry choices. This top looks very professional and is a perfect choice for the office or a night out; the collar elevates this top and makes it very classy. It fits true to size and is not transparent at all.

Got this for my wife and she loved it. First off, it came very nicely vacuumed packed in a plastic bag. Once opened, the shirt material is very good. You can feel the quality of the fabric which is very good. The size is perfect for her. The workmanship is excellent.

评论概述: Polo Shirts are perfect for a business casual look.
评论详情: The WIHOLL Women's Long Sleeve Polo Shirts are perfect for a business casual look, featuring a stylish collared design and a flattering V-neck. Made from a comfortable ribbed knit fabric, these slim-fit blouses offer both elegance and ease, making them a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Whether you're heading to the office or enjoying a casual outing, these tops provide a chic and polished appearance that effortlessly combines professionalism with comfort.

I don't know what this knit or weave is, but it feels like velvet .. so soft! It makes me wonder how it will wear (will it pill up like crazy because it literally feels like wearing a cloud?) but I love it at first blush. The lavender color is very light/subtle and the top itself is very clingy and form fitting. I am 5'5, 36C, 160 and ordered a size large and it is snug but not unflattering. I think this is going to be awesome for fall!
